r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: New features : - Add setLifeTime() method to change the cache lifetime dynamicaly Changes : - changes in the directory layout and in file names to (better) respect PEAR standards => incompatibility with 0.3 version even there is no incompatible change in the API
